XXmpratpru:457: yadā mahābrāhmaṇa śūrpārake mahānagaravare koṣavaṇikasya śreṣṭhinaḥ putro vidyāvādiko babhūva
XXmpratpru:458: tena tad vidyābalena takṣako nāgarājā ākarṣitaḥ /
XXmpratpru:459: ākarṣayitvā ca pramāṇavaśād baddho nadānto yāvat tenāsau krodhād daṣṭaḥ /
XXmpratpru:460: sa tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati /
XXmpratpru:461: yathā jānāmi ca me jīvitaṃ niruddham iti /
XXmpratpru:463: na ca kaścic chaknoti viṣaṃ cikitsitum /
XXmpratpru:464: atha traiva śūrpārake mahānagaravare vimalaviśuddhir nāmopāsikā prativasati sma /

XXmpratpru:467: sā tayaikavelāyām anusmṛtamātrayā nirviṣaṃ smṛtipratilabdhaṃ kṛtvā tato mahāvyasanāt parimocayitvā imām eva śuddhiputre mahāvidyāṃ hṛdayagatāṃ kārayati sma /
XXmpratpru:469: api ca mahābrāhmaṇa kiṃ parijñātam iti /

XXmpratpru:471: tasya prātisīmiko balacakrarājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya bārāṇasīmahānagarīṃ parivārya vināśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:474: tataḥ kiṃ tu khalu vayam upāyaṃ kuryāmo yenaitat paracakraṃ vinaśyet /

XXmpratpru:487: kavacaṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāmamadhye 'vatīrya ekākinaiva sarvāsau caturaṅgabalakāyaḥ parājitaḥ

XXmpratpru:506: sukhādvārahārakaḥ saṃghikaṃ cāturdiśikaṃ staupikaṃ gaṇaprāptaṃ ca yad dravyaṃ tat paudgalikaṃ kṛtvā sarvam adhiṣṭhāya takṣayati /

XXmpratpru:512: śrutvā ca punar yena sa bhikṣus tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tasya bhikṣor imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ likhitvā kaṇṭhe badhnāti sma /
XXmpratpru:513: samanantarabaddhāyāṃ mahāpratisarāyāṃ mahāvidyārājñyāṃ tasya bhikṣoḥ sarvā vedanāḥ (Mp_14) praśāntāḥ sarvavyādhibhyaḥ parimuktaḥ svasthaḥ saṃvṛtta iti /
XXmpratpru:514: tasyām eva rātryām atyayābhyupasthite smṛtipratilabdhaḥ kālagataḥ /
XXmpratpru:515: tasminn eva kṣatravare utsṛṣṭo 'vīcau mahānarake upapannaḥ /
XXmpratpru:516: tac ca tasya mṛtaśarīraṃ bhikṣubhiḥ kūṭe sthāpitam /
XXmpratpru:517: sā ca tasya mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī kaṇṭhe baddhaivāsthitā /
XXmpratpru:518: samanantaropapannasya tasya bhikṣos tasminn avīcau mahānarake teṣāṃ nārakānāṃ satvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhavedanāḥ śāntāḥ /
XXmpratpru:522: atha te yamapuruṣā vismayam āpannā yamasya dharmarājasyemaṃ niścayaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma
XXmpratpru:524: praśāntā dāruṇā duḥkhāḥ satvānāṃ karmajāś ca ye /
XXmpratpru:526: karapattrā na bādhante kṣuradhārā na sajjate /
XXmpratpru:528: asipattrāvane pattrā na bādhante karmajā punaḥ /
XXmpratpru:529: yamas tvaṃ dharmarājo 'si dharmeṇa śāsayase prajām //
XXmpratpru:530: idaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ nālpam asmākaṃ vaktum arhasi /
XXmpratpru:533: kim etat kathyatāṃ śīghraṃ kathaṃ tv iti vaco 'vadat //
XXmpratpru:537: avīcir yasya nāmedaṃ tenāsau narakasaṃkaṭa ucyate //
XXmpratpru:538: karmāṇaṃ yasya vaicitryaṃ satvā ye hi sukhīkṛtam /
XXmpratpru:539: sukhino hy eva sarvatra punar yānti surālayam //
XXmpratpru:540: yamo 'pi dharmarājā vai dṛṣṭvā vadati vismitaḥ /
XXmpratpru:541: maharddhiko 'yaṃ mahac cāsya śarīraṃ pūrvo janmikam //
XXmpratpru:542: yathā dhātuśatair vṛndaṃ stūpaṃ śobhati śāśvatam /
XXmpratpru:544: atha te narakapālā yakṣā yamasya dharmarājasya idaṃ vacanam abruvan /
XXmpratpru:547: pratipat smārayed yas tu sa na gacchati durgatiṃ sugatiṃ gacchate cāsau pratisarābhāvabhāvitaḥ
XXmpratpru:551: atha te yakṣā yamapuruṣā tasyām eva rātryāṃ puṣkarāvatīṃ gatāḥ /
XXmpratpru:557: yāvat tasya ca tair yakṣaiḥ pratisarākūṭeti nāma sthāpitam //
XXmpratpru:558: atha te yakṣā punar āgatya yamasya dharmarājasyemaṃ niścayaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma /
XXmpratpru:560: samanantarodite tasmin vacanaparyavasāne mahāsatvas taṃ nārakaṃ śarīraṃ vijahya trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ /
XXmpratpru:562: tena hi mahābrāhmaṇa parijñātavatī pūrvatas tasmād eveyaṃ mahāpratisarā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā likhitavyā yathāvidhinā nityaṃ śarīragatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
XXmpratpru:567: pūrvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa hiṅgumardane mahānagare vimalaśaṅkho nāma śreṣṭhī mahādhanakanakasamṛddhaḥ paripūrṇakośakośāgārasaṃpanno babhūva /
XXmpratpru:569: atha sa mahāsārthavāho yānapātram āsādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXmpratpru:571: 'vastabdhaḥ vināśayitukāmā nāgāś ca saṃkṣubdhā mahāntagarjanā sphoṭaṃ
XXmpratpru:574: tatas te vaṇijo mahatā duḥkhenābhyāhatacittās taṃ mahāntaṃ nāgasaṃkṣobhaṃ vidyudulkāṃ vajrāśaniṃ cotsṛjanti taiś ca timiṅgilaiḥ potam avastabdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāntaṃ utkrośanaṃ śabdaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:576: tatas te sārthavāhasyopagamya karuṇam idaṃ vacanam abruvan /
XXmpratpru:578: atha khalu mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhacitto mahāmatiḥ vaṇijo viklavībhūtān idaṃ vacanam abruvat /
XXmpratpru:579: mā bhair mā bhair vaṇijo bhavanto vīratāṃ vrajata /
XXmpratpru:581: tata vīramānaso bhūtā vaṇija idaṃ vacanam abruvan /
XXmpratpru:582: kim etat tena mahāsatva brūhi śīghram avighnataḥ /
XXmpratpru:583: yāvad jīvitam asmākaṃ tvat prabhāvād mahāmate kathyatāṃ jñānamahātmyaṃ paścāt kiṃ kariṣyasi
XXmpratpru:584: tataḥ sārthapatis teṣām imāṃ vidyām udāharat /
XXmpratpru:585: asti mama mahāvidyā pratisarā nāma viśrutā //
XXmpratpru:588: tataḥ mahāsārthavāhas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ likhitvā dhvajāgrāvaropitāṃ karoti sma /
XXmpratpru:589: samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropitāyām asyāṃ mahāpratisarāyāṃ mahāvidyārājñyāṃ sarva eva te timiṅgilās taṃ potam ekajvālībhūtaṃ paśyanti /
XXmpratpru:590: tatas te nāgā maitramanasas teṣām antike
XXmpratpru:592: te ca timiṅgilā asyā mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyārājñyā anubhāvena dahyamānāḥ /
XXmpratpru:594: sārthikās tair mahānāgair mahati mahāratnadvīpe prāpitā iti //
XXmpratpru:595: jñātavatīyaṃ mahāvidyā mahāpratisarā sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā tena hetunā mahābrāhmaṇa mahāvidyeti khyātā /
XXmpratpru:596: tasmād avaśyam (Mp_17) eveyaṃ dhvajāgrāvaropitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
XXmpratpru:607: ye ca tasmin viṣaye mahānāgās te samyag eva kālena kālaṃ varṣadhārām utsṛjanti /
XXmpratpru:608: yasmin viṣaye iyaṃ vidyārājñī mahāpratisarā nāma pracariṣyati /
XXmpratpru:609: tatra taiḥ satvair jñātvā pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā nānāgandhair nānāpuṣpair nānāvastraiḥ pariveṣayitvā caityasyopari dhvajāgrāvaropayitāṃ kṛtvā nānāvādyatūryasaṃgītibhir vādyamānābhiḥ pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tatas teṣāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ yathā ciñcitam āśāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti /
XXmpratpru:612: putrārthī labhate garbhasaṃdhāraṇī parāḥ sukhena vardhate garbhaḥ sukhenaiva prasūyate /
XXmpratpru:615: ihaiva magadhaviṣaye rājā prasāritapāṇir nāma sa cāputrako 'bhūva /
XXmpratpru:617: tena rājñā jātamātreṇa pāṇiṃ prasārya mātuḥ stanau gṛhītvā yāvad āptaṃ kṣīraṃ pītam /
XXmpratpru:618: tau ca stanau saha sparśamātreṇa suvarṇavarṇau saṃvṛttau /
XXmpratpru:620: tena kāraṇena tasya rājñaḥ prasāritapāṇir iti nāma sthāpitam /
XXmpratpru:621: anyac ca tasya rājñaḥ yācanakajanā āgacchanti /
XXmpratpru:622: tadā sa rājā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ prasārayaty upary antarikṣe bodhisatvaḥ sa rājā tena hetunā tasya buddhābhiprasannā devatā divyai ratnaviśeṣaiḥ suvarṇamaṇibhiś ca pāṇiṃ paripūrayanti /
XXmpratpru:626: devānāṃ ca mahānti pūjāsatkārāṇi karoti putrahetor na ca putraṃ pratilabhate /
XXmpratpru:627: sa paurāṇāṃ tathāgatacaityānāṃ purataḥ pūjāsatkāraṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:628: mahānti ca pūjāsatkārāṇi karoti dānāni ca dadāti /
XXmpratpru:632: tat kasya hetor bhūtapūrvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa asminn eva magadhaviṣaye mallā nāma janapade kuśinagare mahāpaṭṭanavare bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasya śāsane samutpanno dharmacittakaḥ
XXmpratpru:633: kaścid mahāsatvo dharmamatir nāma śreṣṭhī prativasati /
XXmpratpru:634: sa sarvasatvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam upasthāpya imām eva mahāvidyāṃ mahāpratisarām ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
XXmpratpru:635: atha kaścid eko daridrapuruṣas taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tasya śreṣṭhina idaṃ vacanam abruvat /
XXmpratpru:636: aham āryasya niveśane bhṛtikarmaṃ kariṣyāmi dharmaṃ ca śroṣyāmi /
XXmpratpru:637: yadā mama kiṃcid bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ dharmaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi /
XXmpratpru:638: tasya gṛhavyāpāraṃ kurvato dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvato yāvad apareṇa kālasamayena śreṣṭhinā eko dīnāro dattaḥ /
XXmpratpru:639: sa tena sarvasatvaparitrāṇārthaṃ bodhicittam utpādya sādhāṛaṃ kṛtvā mahāpratisarāratneti niryātitā /
XXmpratpru:640: evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anena mahāphalena mama sarvasatvānāṃ ca dāridraduḥkhasaṃcchedaḥ syāt
XXmpratpru:641: anena kāraṇena tad dānaṃ parīkṣayaṃ na gacchati /
XXmpratpru:642: evaṃ bahuvidhānekavidhapuṇyābhisaṃskārakṛto devatāś ca pūjitā yāvad buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitās tadā ca śuddhāvāsakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ svapne darśanaṃ dattam /
XXmpratpru:643: evaṃ cābhihitaṃ bho mahārāja samantajvālāmālāviśuddhisphūritacintāmaṇir mahāmudrāhṛdayāparājitā mahādhāraṇī mahāvidyārājñī mahāpratisarā nāma taṃ yathāvidhinā kalpenābhihitena upavāsoṣitāyā agramahiṣyā devyāḥ śarīre baddhā tatas te putrapratilambho bhaviṣyatīti /
XXmpratpru:644: atha sa rājā prativiśuddhas tasyām eva rātryām atyayena saṃkhyālipinakṣatragrahavipañcakān kulabrāhmaṇān saṃnipātya yathāvidhinā
XXmpratpru:645: (Mp_19) kalpopadiṣṭena puṣye nakṣatrarāje pratipanne susnātagātrāyā upavāsoṣitāyā agramahiṣyā devyā yathāvidhinā likhyemāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ
XXmpratpru:647: mahatīṃ mahābuddhacaityeṣu pūjām akarṣīd anekāni ca ratnaviśeṣāṇi satvānāṃ dānāni dattāni
XXmpratpru:648: tato navānāṃ māsānām abhyayāt putro jāto 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
XXmpratpru:650: tato jñātvā mahābrāhmaṇa sarvakāmaṃgamā aparājitā mahāpratisarāratneti viśrutā mahāvidyārājñī sarvatathāgatapujitā śakrasyāpīyaṃ cūḍāmaṇiḥ sarvathā //
XXmpratpru:651: yadā śakro devānām indro mahāsaṃgrāmam asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ kartukāmas tadā imāṃ mahāvidyāṃ kavacaṃ kṛtvā saṃgrāmamadhye 'vatīrya cūḍāyām avasthāpya sarvāsurān nirjitya sukhaṃ svastinā kṣemeṇa devapuraṃ praviśati /
XXmpratpru:653: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa prathamacittotpādam upādāya boddhisatvasya mahāsatvasyemāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ dhārayataḥ sarvamārair anavamṛdyatā bhavati /
XXmpratpru:654: yasyaiṣā kaṇṭhagatā bhaviṣyati sa sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati /
XXmpratpru:656: sarvadevamanuṣyāmanuṣyarājarājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiś ca satatasamitaṃ vanditaḥ pūjitaḥ saṃmānito bhaviṣyati /
XXmpratpru:663: imāni cānena catvāry aparājitāmahāvidyāmantrapadahṛdayāni satatasamitaṃ likhitvā kāyakaṇṭhagatāni kṛtvā dhārayitavyāni /
XXmpratpru:669: oṃ amṛtavare vara vara pravara viśuddhe hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
XXmpratpru:670: oṃ amṛtavilokini garbhasaṃrakṣaṇi ākarṣaṇi hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
XXmpratpru:672: oṃ vimale vipule jaya vare amṛte hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
XXmpratpru:673: oṃ bhara bhara saṃbhara saṃbhara indriyabalaviśodhane hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
XXmpratpru:674: oṃ maṇidhari vajriṇi mahāpratisare hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā //
XXmpratpru:676: aśeṣaiḥ sarvabuddhair bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakair ekasvarasaṃnipātena ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa imāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni bhāṣitāni mahāpratisarāmahāvidyārājñīhṛdayakavacāny etāni mantrapattrapadāni sarvatathāgatadharmamudrayā mudritāni /
XXmpratpru:677: atidullabham apy eṣāṃ śravaṇaṃ kiṃ punaḥ likhanapaṭhanadhāraṇavācanaparadeśanā buddhakṛtyam etad iti jñātavyā
XXmpratpru:679: sarvatathāgataiḥ praśaṃsitā anumoditā vyākṛtā paramadullabheyaṃ mahādhāraṇī aparājitā mahāpratisarā nāmadheyaṃ śravaṇam api paramadullabham /
XXmpratpru:686: mahāyānodgrahaṇalikhanavācanapaṭhanasvādhyāyanaśravaṇadhāraṇābhiyuktānāṃ paripālikeyaṃ mahādhāraṇī yāvad buddhabodhiparipūrayitrīyaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī na kvacit pratijanyate sarvatra mahāpūjāṃ prāpnoti yathāhaṃ śāstā jitaviṣayaḥ /
XXmpratpru:689: yadā ca bhagavān vipulaprahasitavadanamaṇikanakaratnajvalaraśmiprabhāsābhyudgatarājas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena bodhimaṇḍalas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya sarvabuddhapraśastaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmas tadā
XXmpratpru:690: tasya bhagavataḥ sarvamāraiḥ saparivārair anekamārakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivṛtair nānārūpavirūpabhayabhairavaśabdākulair bahuvividhamāraviṣayavikurvaṇādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitair nānāpraharaṇavṛṣṭībhir abhinirmāyāgatya caturdiśaṃ parivāryāntarāyaḥ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:691: tataḥ sa bhagavān vipulaprahasitavadanamaṇikanakaratnajvalaraśmiprabhāsābhyudgatarājo muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm āsthāya imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ manasā saptakṛtvaḥ pravartayāmāsa /
XXmpratpru:692: samanantaraṃ pravartayitāyām asyāṃ mahāpratisarāyāṃ mahāvidyārājñyāṃ tatkṣaṇād eva sarve te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso dadṛśur bhagavata ekaikasmād romakūpavivarād anekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi puruṣāṇāṃ saṃnaddhakavacānāṃ jvalitakhaṅgaparaśupāśamudgarāsimusaratriśūrahastānām evaṃ vācaṃ
XXmpratpru:694: gṛhṇata 2 bandhata 2 duṣṭamārān vidhvaṃsaya duṣṭacittān vicūrṇaya jīvitaṃ sarvaduṣṭagrahavighnavināyakānāṃ ye bhagavato viheṭhanaṃ kurvanti /
XXmpratpru:695: tatas te sarvaduṣṭamārāmaitrīkhaṅgeṇābhinirjitāṃ kṛtvā kecic chikṣāpadāni grāhitā /
XXmpratpru:696: kecid yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtās tatra mahānubhāvāḥ /
XXmpratpru:697: anye punas tān tathāgataromavivaravinirgatān mahāpuruṣān dṛṣṭvā tasmin nagare vihvalībhūtā ṛddhiparihīṇā naṣṭapratibhānabalaparākramā vidhvastāḥ /
XXmpratpru:701: sarvavighnavināyakān mārāṃś ca pāpīyāṃso vidhvaṃsayitvottīrṇaḥ pāraṃgata iti /
XXmpratpru:702: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa mahābalavegarddhipāramitāprāpteyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī smaraṇamātreṇa sarvavyasanabhayabhairavebhyaḥ (Mp_22) parimocayati /
XXmpratpru:704: tasmāt tarhi mahābrāhmaṇa nityam evānusmaraṇamātreṇa manasi kartavyā /
XXmpratpru:705: sarvakālaṃ ca likhitvā kāyakaṇṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
XXmpratpru:707: ujjayanyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ rājño brahmadattasya vihite kenacit puruṣeṇāparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXmpratpru:710: atha te vadhapuruṣās taṃ rājñājñaptaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā parvatavivaraṃ nītvā asikośān niṣkāsya taṃ puruṣaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:711: tadā sa puruṣa imāṃ mahāpratisarāṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ manasā smṛtavān likhitāṃ ca dakṣiṇe bāhau baddhvā dhārayati sma /
XXmpratpru:712: tasya mahāsatvasyāsyā mahāvidyāyāḥ prabhāvenāsir ekajvālībhūtā khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ yathā pāṃśumayo vikīrṇa iti /
XXmpratpru:713: tatas te vadhakapuruṣā imam evaṃ niścayaṃ rājaṃ vistareṇārocayāmāsuḥ /
XXmpratpru:715: gacchata bho puruṣā anyatarasmin pradeśe yakṣaguhāsti /
XXmpratpru:718: tataḥ sa puruṣo vadhakapuruṣais tasyāṃ yakṣaguhāyāṃ choritaḥ /
XXmpratpru:719: samanantara chorite tasmin yakṣaguhāyāṃ tatas te yakṣāḥ sarve tuṣṭamanaso hṛṣṭacittāś ca pradhāvitā mānuṣaṃ bhakṣayiṣyāma iti /
XXmpratpru:720: te paśyanti asyā mahāpratisarāyā mahāvidyārājñyā anubhāvena taṃ puruṣam ekajvalībhūtaṃ dedīpyamānaṃ vigrahaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca sarva eva te yakṣā saṃtrastā dahyamānaṃ svaśarīraṃ paśyanti /
XXmpratpru:721: atha te yakṣā vismayaṃ samāpannās taṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā bahirdvāre 'vasthāpya pradakṣiṇīkartum ārabdhāḥ /
XXmpratpru:722: yāvat tair vadhakapuruṣai rājñe niścayo 'yaṃ vistareṇāroitaḥ /
XXmpratpru:723: tato bhūyo rājā prakupitaś caṇḍībhūtaḥ kathayati /
XXmpratpru:724: yad eva bhavanto gacchatainaṃ puruṣaṃ baddhvā nadyāṃ prakṣipata /
XXmpratpru:725: tataḥ sa puruṣo vadhakapuruṣair baddhvā nadyām prakṣiptaḥ /
XXmpratpru:726: samanantaraṃ prakṣipte tasmin mahāpuruṣe sā nadī nirudakī bhūtā yatha sa (Mp_23) puruṣaḥ sthalagata eva tiṣṭhati /
XXmpratpru:728: rājā śrutvā tato rājā vismitotphullavadanaḥ kathayati /
XXmpratpru:730: kim atra kāraṇaṃ syād iti me vitarkaḥ /
XXmpratpru:731: atha sa rājā taṃ puruṣam āhūyainam āha /
XXmpratpru:744: tato rājñā prahṛṣṭamānasena mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī pūjitā mānitābhinanditā /
XXmpratpru:745: tasya puruṣasya poṭṭabandhaṃ kṛtvā svasya janapadasya purastān nagarajyeṣṭhatāyām abhiṣeko dattaḥ /
XXmpratpru:746: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa iyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī sarvatra mahatīpūjāṃ labhate /
XXmpratpru:748: evaṃ hi mahābrāhmaṇa pūrvam iyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī na kvacit pratihanyate /
XXmpratpru:749: tasmād avaśyam iyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī kāyakaṇṭhagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyā /
XXmpratpru:750: api tu mahābrāhmaṇa manukṣetreṇeyaṃ mahāvidyārājñī supraśastena vidhānena likhitavyā //
XXmpratpru:751: atha sa mahābrāhmaṇo 'tīva prahṛṣṭamanasā bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalakenābhipraṇamya praṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:752: kīdṛśena bhadanta bhagavan vidhāneneyaṃ mahāpratisarā mahāvidyārājñī likhitavyā //
XXmpratpru:754: śṛṇu mahābrāhmaṇa tvām ahaṃ vakṣye sarvasatvānukaṃpayā /
XXmpratpru:755: yena satvāḥ sukhino bhontu mucyatai karmasaṃkaṭāt //
XXmpratpru:767: puṣpadhūpāś ca gandhāś ca dātavyātra mahārihā //
XXmpratpru:768: dhūpanaṃ candanaṃ caiva spṛkkāguru tathaiva ca /
XXmpratpru:773: pūrayed balikumbhāś ca lakṣaṇād yān sumaṅgalān //
XXmpratpru:779: evaṃ kṛte likhed vipra yad icchet siddhim ātmanaḥ //
XXmpratpru:781: paṭṭe vā vastrabhūrje vānyatra vā yatra kutracit //
XXmpratpru:782: likhet strīṣu ca putrārthī samyaggorocanena vai /
XXmpratpru:787: pravarṣaś cāpi kartavyāś catuḥ koṇeṣu parvatāḥ //
XXmpratpru:788: evaṃ likhet prayatnena yad icched jīvitaṃ sukham /
XXmpratpru:791: nānārūpāś ca kartavyā mudrācihnaś ca padminī //
XXmpratpru:792: dve padme athavā trīṇi catvāri pañca vā likhet /
XXmpratpru:793: padmānāṃ ca tathā kuryāt keśarāṇi samantataḥ //
XXmpratpru:796: parśuṃ kuryāt tathā padme atha patre samantataḥ /
XXmpratpru:797: sakhaṅgaṃ padmaṃ kurvīta tat padmaṃ śitam eva ca //
XXmpratpru:798: śaṅkhaṃ padme tathā kuryāt sarvatra vidhivistaram /
XXmpratpru:802: bhikṣuṃ vajradharaṃ kuryād duṣṭatarjanaṃ tat param /
XXmpratpru:803: caturaś ca mahārājāṃś catuḥ pārśveṣu saṃlikhet //
XXmpratpru:805: śūdreṣu ca sadā saumyaṃ cakrasvāminam ālikhet //
XXmpratpru:806: vaiśyeṣu ca vaiśramaṇam indraś caiva sureśvaraḥ /
XXmpratpru:808: syāmavarṇā bhaved yātu raudraṃ tasyā samālikhet /
XXmpratpru:811: kṛṣāyāḥ pūrṇabhadras tu mayā hy uktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā //
XXmpratpru:812: gulviṇyāś ca mahākālo likhec ca brahmadevatān /
XXmpratpru:815: dhārayet satataṃ kaṇṭhe bhadraṃ tasya bhaviṣyati //
XXmpratpru:817: padmasya keśare pāśaṃ cakraṃ cāpi tathāparam //
XXmpratpru:818: vajraṃ padme tathā likhyaṃ mudgalaṃ padmasaṃsthitam /
XXmpratpru:819: śaktiṃ likhet tathā padme yathāvidhiṣu dṛṣyate //
XXmpratpru:824: pārthivānāṃ balaṃ nityaṃ sārthavāhaṃ likhed budhaḥ /
XXmpratpru:827: likhec ca khaṇḍāṃ pāṇḍānāṃ putralābho bhaviṣyati //
XXmpratpru:831: prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ svayaṃbhū vacanaṃ yathā //
XXmpratpru:832: loke 'smin paramaṃ saukhyaṃ paraloke paraṃ sukham /
XXmpratpru:834: jambudvīpe śubhe ramye vidyāsaukhyaṃ ca nityaśaḥ /
XXmpratpru:839: buddhāś ca bodhisatvāś ca āśvāsayanti nityaśaḥ //
XXmpratpru:844: nāsau hanyati śastreṇa na viṣeṇa nāgninā /
XXmpratpru:846: darśanāt sparśanāc caiva śravaṇād eva sarvataḥ /
XXmpratpru:849: te sarve na bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ vidyā subhāṣitā //
XXmpratpru:850: sarvathā sarvamārais tu śṛṇu vakṣāmi tatvataḥ /
XXmpratpru:855: yatra yatra kṛtā rakṣā bhavaty abaddho na saṃśayaḥ //
XXmpratpru:859: duṣprekṣitaṃ dullikhitaṃ kākhordā ye ca dāruṇāḥ //
XXmpratpru:861: sarve tasya praśāmyanti rakṣāṃ dhāvayate tu yaḥ //
XXmpratpru:864: sarve te pralapaṃ yānti pratisarā sāpatarjitāḥ /
XXmpratpru:865: buddhā rakṣanti sarvajñā bodhisatvāś ca pūratāḥ //
XXmpratpru:867: anye ca bahuvidhā bhūyo devā nāgā mahārddhikāḥ //
XXmpratpru:868: rakṣāṃ kurvanti tasyeme cāsmin yuktasya nityaśaḥ /
XXmpratpru:870: nirbhayo bhavati sarvatra ity evaṃ munir abravīt /
XXmpratpru:871: duḥsvapnā duṣkṛtā ye ca upasargā ye ca dāruṇā //
XXmpratpru:874: itayo dāruṇā ye ca grasante mānuṣīṃ prajām /
XXmpratpru:876: sarve te pralapaṃ yānti rakṣā yatra mahābalāḥ /
XXmpratpru:880: parikṣīṇāyuṣo yas tu saptāhamṛta eva ca /
